GSD.product_version: versions from v3.11 to before v5.4.212
GSD.description:
net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_net_busy_poll.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.212 by commit 6e8f9df62dbe2d83dc35bf8cd011b466c9344ca9, it was introduced in version v3.11 by commit 060212928670593fb89243640bf05cf89560b023. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_net_busy_poll.
